```typescript
import { defineDocumentType, makeSource } from 'contentlayer/source-files';

export const Post = defineDocumentType(() => ({
  name: 'Post',
  filePathPattern: `blog/**/*.mdx`,
  contentType: 'mdx',
  fields: {
    title: { type: 'string', required: true },
    date: { type: 'date', required: true },
    description: { type: 'string' },
    published: { type: 'boolean', required: true },
    image: { type: 'string', required: true },
  },
  computedFields: {
    slug: {
      type: 'string',
      resolve: (doc) => `/${doc._raw.flattenedPath}`,

}));
```

`,(0,a.jsxDEV)(t.pre,{children:(0,a.jsxDEV)(t.code,{className:"language-typescript",children:`import { defineDocumentType, makeSource } from 'contentlayer/source-files';

export const Post = defineDocumentType(() => ({
  name: 'Post',
  filePathPattern: \`blog/**/*.mdx\`,
  contentType: 'mdx',
  fields: {
    title: { type: 'string', required: true },
    date: { type: 'date', required: true },
    description: { type: 'string' },
    published: { type: 'boolean', required: true },
    image: { type: 'string', required: true },
  },
  computedFields: {
    slug: {
      type: 'string',
      resolve: (doc) => \`/\${doc._raw.flattenedPath}\`,
    },
  },
}));
`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/kimurachihiro/Desktop/dev/post-writer-webapp/content/blog/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-9a7fca3c-019b-45ca-b207-9fe43cfaf0c4.mdx",lineNumber:41,columnNumber:1},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/kimurachihiro/Desktop/dev/post-writer-webapp/content/blog/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-9a7fca3c-019b-45ca-b207-9fe43cfaf0c4.mdx",lineNumber:41,columnNumber:1},this),`
